title: Welcome to MEW
desc1: Welcome to the brand new MEW! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
v5-title: This is the old version of MEW!
v5-desc1: You are missing out on the newest version and features of MEW! The version you are on currently (V5) will be removed eventually, so please check out the {v6}, make sure you can access your wallet as expected, and give us your feedback on Twitter {twitter} or via email {email}.
